about_the_game:
Datura Time - Unleash Your Heroic Potential in a Retro-3D, Eastern European-Inspired Alternate Reality!

Datura Time is a third-person action-adventure game that catapults you into a realm swirling with mystery, suspense, and dynamic action. This captivating world is a tribute to the 90's console games era, handcrafted with love and passion by a single-developer, Vladeta Stojanovic, with an infusion of post-Soviet and Eastern European aesthetics.

You, the player, are plunged into an enigmatic alternative reality known as the "Zone" after an accidental encounter with a peculiar drug - "Datura". Here, you'll cross paths with a host of characters, some allies, some foes, all delivering a singular message - you are an outsider and the unfolding reality is more than meets the eye.

As you navigate this perilous world, you'll unravel the Zone's hidden truths - it's a metaphysical limbo, home to the souls of Eastern Europe and the former Soviet Union, currently under the control of malevolent entities. This sinister realm is in desperate need of a true hero - a role YOU never expected but must now embrace. Your mission? Survive, defeat the wicked forces, restore balance, and return home.

Key Features

  • Exhilarating Adventure: Traverse through 29 thrilling levels, with each level meticulously designed to challenge your skills and push the story forward.

  • Distinct Eastern European Aesthetics: Immerse yourself in the post-Soviet and Eastern European influenced environments, artistically crafted to blend history and imagination, delivering a gaming experience like no other.

  • Engaging Third-Person Combat: Tackle tight and intense situations either with a Balkan-Rambo-style approach or by strategically utilizing the enigmatic properties of Datura.

  • Diverse Enemy and Weapon Lineup: Overcome unique enemies, each with their distinct abilities and weaknesses, using an array of weapons inspired by Eastern Bloc classics.

  • Strategic Gameplay: Forge your path through the game with your chosen strategy - go all-out aggressive, outsmart your enemies, or choose the stealthy approach. Every choice presents a new, thrilling outcome.

  • Engaging Lore and Characters: Dive deep into the game's rich lore through intriguing interactions with well-crafted NPCs and discover the enigma of the Zone.

  • Nostalgic 90's Visuals: Enjoy a true retro-gaming experience brought alive by nostalgic 3D graphics that pay homage to the beloved 90's console games era.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is intended for mature audiences. This game contains references to use of alcohol and potentially illegal drugs. The game also contains non-realistic depictions of gore, violence and horror. The developers of this game do not in any way recommend nor promote the consumption of illegal substances in real life.

name: Datura Time

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Step into the enigmatic world of Datura Time and uncover the alluring lore behind the mysterious "Zone", while battling sinister forces in the style of 90s fifth generation 3D action adventure games - with a distinctive post-Soviet and Eastern European inspired aesthetic.
